resources.string: Sisitemu yo kugerwaho na sisitemu ikoreshwa muri iyi serivisi ni:
"- Kugerwaho Byuzuye: gushyira buto itagaragara hafi no munsi ya kamera yimbere kugirango ikorwe nka shortcut kubakoresha imirimo yatoranijwe"
Hindura ecran ya ecran hagati yindangagaciro na ndende
Kora umwobo wa kamera ukorana, mugihe nta menyesha cyangwa ibyabaye bigomba kwerekanwa, ukanze kuri kamera ya kamera:
Fungura imbaraga za buto ya menu
Fungura menu ya porogaramu ya vuba
Hindura uburyo bwa ringer (amajwi / ikiragi). byoroshye gucecekesha terefone mbere yo kuryama hanyuma uyisubize muburyo bwamajwi iyo ubyutse
Banza ushoboze uruhushya rwo gutanga serivisi
Banza ushoboze kumenyesha Dynamic nyuma yo kurangiza igenamiterere
Banza ushoboze kumenyesha uruhushya rwo kumenyesha
Kubizamini gusa, ntabwo ari imenyesha nyirizina.
Nyamuneka reba kururu rubuga %1$s urebe intambwe hamwe namashusho
Mu buryo bwikora kwagura imenyesha ryingenzi
Imenyekanisha ryingenzi niryo risanzwe ryakiriwe nkibimenyeshwa
Itangira muri ecran yuzuye mugihe ecran irahari
Kumenyesha ibintu neza mugihe igikoresho gifunze.
Erekana imenyesha hafi ya kamera cyangwa ahantu hatandukanye kuri ecran hamwe nuburyo bwinshi bugezweho bwo guhitamo. irashobora kandi gushyirwaho nkimenyesha LED itara.
Koresha umwobo wa kamera nkurwego rwa bateri nkumurongo uzenguruka uzengurutse umwobo nawo byerekana iterambere ryishyurwa.
Erekana ubu gutunganya no gukuramo nkumuzenguruko uzenguruka umurongo wa kamera.
Hindura umwobo wa kamera muri buto ya shortcut! shiraho ibikorwa byigenga kuri buri gukoraho, gukanda kabiri, gukanda birebire no guhanagura impande zombi za kamera.
Erekana ishusho ya animasiyo yerekana kwishyuza nurwego rwa bateri
Guhindura imenyekanisha ryagutse kugirango risibe, bizanakuraho imenyesha nyirizina
Kanda izakingura kandi gukanda birebire bizaguka
Iyo Dynamic Notification igaragara ihishe imiterere yumurongo uyitwikirije ibara ryiza kandi mugihe nta Dynamic Notification ibyabaye byerekana imiterere yumurongo

"Uburyo bwaho. utabitse cyangwa ngo usangire amakuru yawe. gutunganya byose bikozwe mugace kode kuri terefone yawe. - Baza paki zose zashyizweho kugirango ubashe kwihindura ibara rya Dynamic Notification ibara kuri porogaramu. "
Banza uhagarike kumenyesha Dynamic Kumenyesha hanyuma ushoboze Umufasha hanyuma ushoboze kumenyesha Dynamic
Erekana imenyekanisha ryakiriwe muburyo bwagutse, rigabanywa nyuma yamasegonda make kandi rishobora kugabanywa, gufungura cyangwa guhanagurwa no gukorana nayo.
Erekana imenyekanisha ryakiriwe muburyo buto, bushobora kwagurwa, gufungura cyangwa guhanagurwa no gukorana nayo.
Erekana imenyekanisha ryakiriwe muburyo bwagutse niba ari imenyesha ryingenzi, kandi muburyo buto bwo kumenyeshwa bisanzwe
Rimwe nyuma yo kwakira imenyesha, hanyuma ongera werekane nyuma yigihe cyose ecran ifunguye cyangwa ifunze.
Emerera iyi porogaramu gukora igihe ubishakiye.
Emerera sisitemu kubuza iyi porogaramu gukora rimwe na rimwe.
Ni ngombwa kubashoboza kuri gahunda; banza ushoboze kumenyesha umufasha wa Dynamic hanyuma ushoboze kumenyesha Dynamic
Igipimo kigutwara amasegonda bisobanura kuri njye ubuziraherezo kandi unshishikarize gukora uburyo bwinshi nibiranga
Hindura ecran mugihe wintoki waguye imenyesha kugirango wibande kumatangazo yagutse
Mugaragaza ecran mugihe wintoki waguye imenyesha kugirango wibande kumatangazo yagutse
Reba ibirenze kwamamaza kugirango ubone byinshi

Imiterere ya ecran yuzuye, byoroshye gusoma mugihe terefone itari mukiganza, byoroshye kubyitwaramo no gusubiramo kubimenyeshwa. Irashobora gushyirwaho kugirango imenyeshe mugihe ecran ya ecran yazimye kandi nanone intoki yagura ikirwa cyo kumenyesha muburyo bwuzuye mugihe mugihe ecran ya ecran iri
Igenamiterere ryibanze rihindura ikizamini Dynamic Notification
Gusa hamagara leta (guhamagara / kudahamagara), utazi amakuru yo guhamagara, kugirango wirinde gukorakora mugihe uri kuri terefone
Koresha (ishusho gusa) uburyo bwo kwishyuza, umuziki nibyabaye
Impeta itera imbere yerekana bateri yishyurwa
Itara ryatsi rimurika hafi yumwobo wa kamera
Itara ritukura ryaka hafi yumwobo wa kamera
Impeta itera imbere yerekana urwego rwa batiri
Erekana bateri imiterere indecator onlu mugihe uri kuri ecran ya ecran
Ntabwo urambiwe igishushanyo mbonera cyo kumenyesha kuri android?!
Mu buryo bwikora kwaguka mugihe werekana mugihe ecran yazimye
Mugihe habaye imenyesha ryinshi na / cyangwa ibyabaye
Nta makuru yumukoresha yakusanyije cyangwa asangiwe nkuko byatangajwe mububiko bwa Google Play -> iyi page ya porogaramu -> Umutekano wamakuru.
Ntugaragaze mugihe ecran iri muburyo bwimiterere
Ntugakore mugihe ecran iri muburyo bwimiterere

Porogaramu ntabwo ifite uruhushya rwo kwinjira kuri interineti, kubwibyo amakuru yawe ntaho yagiye, urashobora kwemeza neza iki kirego uhereye kumakuru ya porogaramu -> uruhushya, kuri google gukina cyangwa gukanda birebire.
Iki gikoresho ntabwo kirimo umwobo wa kamera. Ariko, urashobora gukoresha uburyo bwimikorere mugukora kuri ceneter yo hejuru ya ecran nkaho hari umwobo wa kamera
Niba gutahura mu buryo bwikora umwobo wa kamera bidasobanutse neza urashobora kubihindura mubice (ingano nu mwanya)
Umwanya uva kuri ecran yo hejuru: %1$s
Amabara yo kumenyesha mbere yo gukata kamera
Igenamiterere rya sisitemu -> Kugerwaho -> gushoboza / kwinjizamo serivisi -> Umufasha wo kumenyesha Dynamic
Koresha kamera kugirango urebe mbere yakiriye imenyesha muburyo budasanzwe kandi bwo guhanga
Igenamiterere rya sisitemu -> Kugerwaho -> gushoboza / kwinjizamo serivisi -> Kumenyesha imbaraga
Igenamiterere rya sisitemu -> Kugerwaho -> gushoboza / kwinjizamo serivisi -> Kumenyesha imbaraga
Shakisha NotiGuy igihembo cyubuzima bwa kimwe cya kabiri cyigiciro.
Hagati hagati ya ecran (ntakindi kiganza kirambuye!)
Mugaragaza iburyo bwiburyo (bubereye muburyo bwa mini: SHAKA GUSA)
Kwitegura gukoreshwa bwa mbere, nyamuneka gerageza nanone nyuma yamasegonda make.
Erekana mugihe ecran yazimye cyangwa muri sisitemu AOD
Kugirango nkwibutse kumanikwa kumanikwa, mugihe ecran iri, ongera werekane ikirwa buri masegonda %1$s

"AKAMARO: niba ufite indi porogaramu isa, gerageza guhagarika imenyekanisha rimenyekana kandi birananirana… bizagira ingaruka kuri iyi porogaramu kandi binananirwa, bityo rero, nyamuneka mbere yo kwipimisha, uhagarike ibintu nk'ibi mu zindi porogaramu, niba bihari. cyangwa guhagarika Thier Kumenyesha Abumva"

Icyitonderwa: kuri samsung porogaramu irashobora guhisha imenyekanisha rimenyekana ariko ntirishobora guhisha akabari gato ka samsung rero nyamuneka shiraho imenyekanisha ryamenyeshejwe muburyo burambuye muri sisitemu -> imenyesha
Gusa werekane Dynamic Notification uterekanye pop yumwimerere hejuru yimenyesha.
Erekana ishusho ngufi ya animasiyo yerekana uburyo bushya bwa ringer
Erekana Dynamic Kumenyesha mugihe ufite imenyesha (ibyabaye) na ecran ni
- gukora mugihe ecran yazimye, Igikoresho kigomba kugira uburyo bwo gufunga, byibuze (swipe yo gufungura) cyangwa Buri gihe Kuri Display Enable
- niba imenyesha ryakiriwe mugihe ecran yari iri, hanyuma porogaramu ikayigaragaza, ntizongera kuyerekana mugihe ecran yazimye kuko usanzwe uzi kuyifite.

Imenyekanisha rizashyirwaho ikimenyetso nkuko bigaragara gusa mugihe wifashishije intoki, kugabanya cyangwa guhanagura imenyekanisha ryagutse, guhanagura imenyekanisha ntarengwa cyangwa gusezerera kumenyesha nyirizina.
Niba %1$s Buri gihe Kwerekana Byari Kuri, erekana imenyekanisha rifite imbaraga muri ryo

Kwiyandikisha kwawe bizahita bivugurura kandi uzishyurwa amafaranga yavuzwe haruguru buri mwaka cyangwa ukwezi (wahisemo nawe) kugeza uhagaritse abiyandikishije mbere yuko igihe cyo kwiyandikisha kirangira. urashobora kuyobora abiyandikishije hanyuma ukazimya kuvugurura imodoka kuva igenamiterere rya konte ya Google Play. kandi uhereye kuriyi porogaramu urupapuro rwibanze -> (Gucunga Kwiyandikisha) buto
Ihanagura ibumoso cyangwa iburyo bizakuraho ibimenyeshwa mbere yo kumenyesha ntabwo ari imenyesha nyirizina. kandi mugihe hari byinshi byamenyeshejwe ubutaha bizerekanwa
Banza urangize gushiraho, hanyuma urebe neza ko uruhushya rusabwa rushoboka, hanyuma ukande ikizamini kugirango utangire iminota 5 yikizamini.
"Urashobora kugerageza premium style mbere yo kugura. koresha buto yo kureba (igishushanyo cy'amaso)"
Komeza kugeza igihe imenyesha risomwe cyangwa ryahagaritswe
Cyangwa komeza hamwe na verisiyo ntarengwa

"- porogaramu yabugenewe yo gufotora kamera. - ibisobanuro birambuye. - ubushobozi bwo gushiraho imikorere itandukanye yo gukoraho rimwe, gukanda kabiri, gukoraho birebire, guhanagura iburyo na swipte ibumoso. - biterwa nuruhushya rumwe gusa."
Uburyo bwumufuka, Kwirengagiza gukoraho mugihe uri gufunga ecran

Kubera iki premium? ibi byadutwaye akazi gakomeye cyane nko gusimbuza imenyekanisha rya sisitemu kuzamuka no gukora uburebure bwimenyesha bwa dinamike busa nuburebure bwa kamera bwihariye kuri iyi porogaramu nta porogaramu yo mu iduka ryimikino ishobora gukora ibi harimo porogaramu zisa nazo ureke kwishushanya no gusiga amabara
